exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a device from the Z-Wave network.
  2. Once the controller is ready to Exclude your device, press and release the top or bottom of the wireless smart dimmer (rocker) to remove it from the network.

Factory Reset

Quickly press ON (Top) button three (3) times then immediately press the OFF (Bottom) button three (3) times. The LED will flash ON/OFF 5 times when completed successfully.

NOTE: This should only be used in the event your network’s primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to include a device to the Z-Wave network.
  2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press and release the top or bottom of the wireless smart switch (rocker) to add it in the network.
label: GE 14294 (ZW3005)
overview:
Transform any home into a smart home with the GE In-Wall Smart Dimmer. The In-Wall Smart Dimmer can easily replace any standard in-wall switch and remotely controls a light in your home. Your home will be equipped with ultimate flexibility with the GE Z-Wave Smart Dimmer, capable of being used by itself or with up to four add-on switches.

Screw terminal installation provides improved space efficiency when replacing existing switches and the integrated LED indicator light allows you to easily locate the switch in a dark room.

The GE Z-Wave In-Wall Smart Dimmer is compatible with any Z-Wave certified gateway, providing access to many popular home automation systems.

Take control of your home lighting with GE Z-Wave Smart Lighting Controls!

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

channels.name: sensor_binary
channels.label: Double Tap
channels.overview: Sends a Basic command (on / off) via association group 3 when the buttons on the device are tapped twice. This does not switch the load on or off.

parameters.label: Night Light
parameters.description: Defines the behavior of the blue LED. Default is on when switch is off.

options.label: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

parameters.label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
parameters.description: This dimmer will start dimming from its current				level.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Step
parameters.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change per step.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Rate
parameters.description: This sets how often the dim level will change.

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Step
parameters.description: How many levels the dimmer will change for each step.

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Rate
parameters.description: This sets how often the dim level will change.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
parameters.description: How many levels the dimmer will change per step.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
parameters.description: This sets how often the dim level will change.

associations.label: Basic Group
associations.description: Support Basic Set and is controlled with the local load

associations.label: Scene Group
associations.description: This group gets notifications of double taps via basic set
